ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 5pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 67. Southwest wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
